div.h3: Lomega Public Schools School Closure Lunch Order Form
div.p: Beginning Tuesday, March 24, Lomega Public Schools will be serving free school meals. We are gathering information to help us prepare and deliver free school meals. Please complete this order form so we will know how many meals to prepare . You can sign up today!
Meals can be picked up from 11:00 until 12:00 at the Elementary School cafeteria in Loyal or at the High School cafeteria. If you need assistance, please contact the school staff below.
Meals are provided free to anyone age 0 to 18 years old that lives in the Lomega School district.
Please let us know if you are getting meals by 5pm the day before so we can prepare the appropriate number of meals.
One person can order for the entire family, you do not have to order for each person. A family with 6 kids can place one order for all 6.
Please let the school know if you are canceling or not picking up meals .
Please be patient, this will take time to get right.
Please call one of the following people if you have questions:
Kevin Lewallen: Elementary Dean of Students-580-886-4215
To complete the order form, please click HERE.
